name: 4 Days To Extraction
description:
On Friday you're being extracted. Can you find out what Dr. Jones knows before then?

4 Days To Extraction is set over five days, April 1st to April 5th 1957 and takes place in Chicago.

I've always found the use of newspapers and cyphers one of the most fascinating parts of Cold War espionage.  As such, The Chicago Daily Defender features quite heavily. So do cyphers.

Pen and paper (or digital equivalent) might come in handy. This is probably not an easy game.

I put this together in quite a hurry (I only saw this Jam the day before the deadline), but I rushed it through because I want to get back into Twine this year. I might add some extra features after the Jam, and will correct any typos etc. Anyhow, hope you enjoy!

Sources
Daily Defender (Daily Edition) (1956-1960) Retrieved from https://search.proquest.com/historical-newspapers/photo-standalone-23-no-title/d...
